specials.name: Bottle Bound
specials.description:
A polong is bound to a bottle as part of the ritual to create it. A polong must remain within 1 mile of its bottle, and regains 2d8+5 hit points for each hour it spends inside its bottle. If a polong’s bottle (AC 14, hardness 1, hp 1) is destroyed, the polong is considered stunned 2 until the bottle reforms in 24 hours. Once per day, a creature that possesses a polong’s bottle can attempt to take control of the polong for 24 hours as if the polong where under the effect of a dominate spell. The polong can attempt a DC 26 Will save to negate this effect.
A creature that’s controlling the polong is immune to its murderous intent aura.

specials.name: Murderous Intent
specials.description: A polong generates a seething aura of unrestrained violence and malicious intent in a 30 ft. radius.  When a creatures enters this aura the Polong may immediately attempt an Intimidation (Demoralize) attempt against the target’s Will DC.

specials.name: Terrible Wounds
specials.description:
A polong’s touch deals slashing damage, and opens up terrible gashes. Each round a creature takes bleed damage from the polong’s touch attack, it must succeed at a DC 23 Fortitude saving throw.
Critical Failure: Drained 1.  Also Enfeebled 1 and Stupefied 1 for 1 minute.
Failure:  Enfeebled 1 and Stupefied 1 for 1 minute
Success: No effect

resistance.value: all damage 10 (except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical)

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious

strikes.name: ghostly slap
strikes.damage: 2d8+9 slashing plus 2d6 persistent bleed, plus terrible wounds
